Class FocusedR

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Mouse
        |
        +--Smarty
              |
              +--FocusedR
public class FocusedR
extends Smarty

The FocusedR mouse will use a strategy that moves in the same direction (if possible) turning right if blocked. Because it is derived from the base class Smarty, it has a memory.
